features: INTENSIVE REPAIR FOR HAIR: This Dove Conditioner for dry hair helps to nourish and visibly repair damaged hair – leaving it feeling healthy and strong
CONDITIONER FOR DAMAGED HAIR: Dove Intensive Repair Deep Conditioner deeply nourishes damaged hair when used as a system with Dove Intensive Repair Shampoo
KERATIN HAIR REPAIR ACTIVES IN THIS CONDITIONER: Dove Intensive Repair Shampoo and Conditioner System, with Keratin Repair Actives, works immediately to seal and smooth the hair surface
NOURISHING HAIR CONDITIONER: makes hair feel smoother, helps detangling and improves manageability. It’s a repairing conditioner that leaves you with visibly smoother and more manageable hair
STRENGTHENING CONDITIONER TO REDUCE HAIR BREAKAGE: Our dry hair conditioner helps to strengthen and reinforce hair against the everyday hair breakages that can be caused by our daily routines
HAIR REPAIR CONDITIONER SUITABLE FOR DAILY USE: Whether you’ve been heat styling or hair coloring – with regular use, you'll have hair that feels stronger and healthier
body.description: Looking for a deep conditioner for damaged hair? From styling to changes in the weather, our hair goes through a lot every day – but with the right products you can have nourished hair, inside and out. We’ve created Dove Nutritive Solutions Intensive Repair Strengthening Conditioner to help smooth, visibly repair damage, strengthen against breakage and progressively nourish with continued use to help give you hair that feels as good as it looks. Even the most heat damaged hair can look healthy day after day. We know that damaged hair care should go beyond removing the outward signs of damage, which is why this Dove deep conditioner for dry hair is formulated to nourish and help restore the hair inside as well. Formulated with Keratin Repair Actives, Dove Nutritive Solutions Intensive Repair Conditioner for damaged hair repairs the signs of damage to the hair surface and, with continued use, penetrates the hair strands to progressively nourish, for beautiful, strong hair that withstands breakage. How to use: Help nourish and restore your hair with Dove Nutritive Solutions Intensive Repair deep hair conditioner. For hair nourishment, apply to clean, wet hair and massage into mid-lengths and ends, and then rinse well. Note: For best results, use after cleansing with Dove Nutritive Solutions Intensive Repair Shampoo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely Love - My Favorite and Only Kind I Will Use
reviews.reviewText: I love dove shampoo and conditioner but this one is hands down my favorite. This is the only type I will use on my hair . It leaves my hair feeling light , smooth, soft , and shiny . It feels and smells amazing !!! I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes hair easier to brush/comb after shower
reviews.reviewText: When "covid" and our government bureaucrats shutdown barber shoppes a few years back - I just decided to let hair grow. Now long enough to need brushing after a shower to untangle and this "conditioner" does the job. Also makes hair behave better (less flyabout or frizzy) after drying. and I found it is best to use less than a capful or it can leave hair like it is a bit oily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best ever for condtr for hair
reviews.reviewText: I also use a little dollop for a leave in. My hair is so soft. Don't have to spend extra for a leave in..I keep my stockpile of this as it's the best! I get compliments how soft my hair is and hubby loves the way it smells.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Have ordered several times. Product was opened and damaged this time. Nothing left to return. It’s all inside the box

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing value for money!!!
reviews.reviewText: Can’t believe I got FOUR of these so cheap! They are even so gentle and moisturizing you could use them on the dog if you HAD to!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My hair feels so soft and bouncy!
reviews.reviewText: I really do love everything Dove. I have only ever used Dove body bars and cream body soap, but this conditioner produced excellent results. My hair was so bouncy and soft after use. It was also shiny and visibly looked moisturized. My ends where most of my problems are still felt and looked a little dry, but it was an overall improvement from before. I’m not sure if I feel the claims of strengthening and intensive repair are really effective, but perhaps with extensive use it could be true. For a budget friendly option, this will leave your hair smelling wonderful and looking soft, shiny and bouncy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I researched conditioners before purchasing and this one was touted as being very hydrating - and it is! It isn't an overpowering scent but it hydrates well and I like the thickness of the conditioner. Works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well on my hair
reviews.reviewText: My hair gets a lot of knots when I wash it. When I use this product I have a lot less and they are easier to brush out. My hair feels nice and soft after using it.
